verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
It's just a little while longer and I'll see you
It's just a little while longer and I’ll know You
It’s just a little while longer and we’ll be together

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
My soul Sings, My soul sings,
My soul Sings, how I love you

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
All I want is just to know your heart
and would you keep me here until we're one
